Having first offered argha to the accomplished substance, distribute it according to the Dharma. Recite the root mantra and make the mudra, and with the mind contemplate the principal deity and recite the mantras of the vidyaraja and vidya-queen. Then, after contemplation, enjoy the substance. As you wish, ascend into the sky and go to the assembly of celestial beings. They will not be able to destroy or despise you, and even if there are enemies, they will not be able to harm you.

The one who has accomplished this should always remember the principal deity and should not forget. The accomplished substance should always be kept in mind or watched with the eyes, in order to uphold the mantra method of the vidyaraja. Because of the vidya-queen, there will be no fear. The samaya mudra, the mudra of the family, and the mudra of the substance should all be upheld.
When meeting with celestial beings, one should first give rise to respect and ask, saying:
'Welcome, are you at ease? Why have you come again?'
Answer with comforting words.

When traveling in the sky, one should not pass over a temple, a solitary tree, a crossroads, the dwelling places of sages, cities, sacrificial altars, assemblies of Brahmins, or the abodes of heretical sages. Due to excessive pride, passing over these will certainly lead to a fall.
Those who fall due to negligence should recite the vidya-raja mantra and contemplate;

if one has already fallen or is about to fall, one will regain one's original position in the sky. Although the form and color may change, the celestial eye sees the path. It is like a sage who instantly arrives by giving rise to the mind, or like one who is unmoving in concentration and instantly arrives.

Therefore, those who roam there first accomplish the path. By the power of blessings, clothes naturally appear as desired. Palaces, flower forests, gardens, various birds, heavenly maidens, games, singing, dancing, music, various desires and pleasures blaze with light, just like the wish-fulfilling jewel trees at the beginning of the eon that can fulfill all wishes.

In order to dwell, jeweled stones are used as seats. Soft grass is spread on the ground in the flowing channels. Various necklaces and bodily ornaments appear, and the trees of auspiciousness have nectar fruits. Up to the place of desired enjoyment and recollection, they all appear before one.

Even though it is like this, one must always protect one's body and not neglect it. One should dwell in pure gardens, forests, and on various mountain peaks, as well as on sea islands, river banks, and sandbars. In order to play, one should dwell in those places. There will then be the superior realms as before, or one will dwell together with the immortals who share the light.
I will now explain the method for fully accomplishing siddhi.

In this way, if it is still not accomplished after seven repetitions, one should perform this method, which will definitely lead to accomplishment.
